title: How do I lvl up in Bords
body: I have to be lvl 6 on Bords to comment, but how do  I lvl up on here if I cant comment.

replies.body:
By posting *this exact discussion!* Sometimes your Boards and Summoner profiles fall out of sync, but making a discussion here in H&S like this usually resolves the issue, which it looks like it did!

Let me know if you have any questions.
